website_summaries.verdict: While they don't quite measure up performance-wise to some competing models in this price range, the Skullcandy Navigators score points with their eye-catching design and comfortable fit.
pros: The relatively compact Skullcandy Navigator on-ear headphones have a slick retro-future design, offer a comfortable fit with decent sound for $99 headphones, and their detachable cord has an Apple friendly inline remote/microphone
cons: Some headphones in this price range sound better
some of the inline remote features won't work with non-iOS devices

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and clear listening
customer_reviews.text: Work very well. Provide clear, warm sound. They are very comfortable. My husband has a pair as well. Ear buds aren’t always the most comfortable thing nor are they the most healthy thing for your ears if you are listening too loud. These Skullcandy headphones have been a great for over a year of wearing. They do cancel out quite a bit of sound. For the money it’s what I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Dizou

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. the headphones were for my son. The sound quality was really nice is what I like most about this product. I was able to enjoy my personal favorite songs by one artist as if he (Prince) were actually in the room with me. what I least liked about the product was that there was no microphone attached to the headphones which was really what and why my son wanted the item. He couldn't connect the heaphones to his gaming system to interact with his friends online. Overall, I love this product and yes I would recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Files

customer_reviews.title: Painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I am looking for comfortable, over the ear, good sounding headphones to wear for long periods. These actually sit on the ear and hurt to wear. I was not able to wear them for 30 minutes. I read the reviews of other people saying how comfortable they are, maybe my ear shape is different. They are good sounding. I have already returned the pair I bought because they hurt too much to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah

customer_reviews.title: Charming, loud, but cheap.
customer_reviews.text: While being some of the more inexpensive headphones they have a charm about them that is made better by the sound quality. I love the way the look however they still have a slightly cheap feal to them from the out of the box blimished black plastic on the ears to the so so pleather on the band and ear pads. They just feel cheap. For what you're paying however I believe they are worth it just be prepared for them to not last as long as some of Skullcandy's other great products.
customer_reviews.author: Barker

customer_reviews.title: Stylish. ...Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: The design is all these 'phones have going for them unfortunately. The sound is worse than my old Sony earphones, the mic. is OK at best, and the quality of the product is- well, on the cheap end? Took less than three months of light use mostly indoors and not traveling for the covering of the ear foam to slip of of the housing. Disappointed, as even my attempts to crimp and pleat and shove the cover back in place don't hold (The picture is of my latest re-shoving) and I got these for an on-the go headset. (I'll add another of them off when they eventually do again and i loose ptience for trying to keep them together...)
customer_reviews.author: DC.Y

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great sound for the price but poor ...
customer_reviews.text: Great design, great sound for the price but poor quality of product. I have posted this before, and got the product substituted, but the same problem happen again. The fabric that covers the earring area, some kind of good quality fake leather, takes off from the metal frame that attacheds it. Whiting days of use, in both products I got, the fabric has completed detached leaving the foam exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Carola

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my ears!
customer_reviews.text: Beware, these tend to be really tight and I haven't figured out how to stretch them without ruining them. I liked the headphones a lot at first, but now I can't wear them for more than a half an hour because they totally squish my ears (and I don't have the best circulation so my ears start to hurt a lot and then go numb). My mom has had the same issue with these. So I am already looking for a replacement and I'm sad.
customer_reviews.author: lmg

customer_reviews.title: I'm a long-time Skullcandy user and I love Skullcandy for being very affordable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long-time Skullcandy user and I love Skullcandy for being very affordable, looking great and lasting a long time. I am very rough with my headphones, I throw them in my backpack and am just not gentle at all, and these stand up to my use. I've used other more expensive headphones that haven't stood up to my use. The sound is great too, I would rate the sound better than Beats headphones. Good if you like bass.
customer_reviews.author: Leannet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound but be gentle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these at 80% off and wasn’t sure what to expect. Well they’re amazing!! Nothing like other skull candy products I’ve tried. These sound very high end and powerful. Very powerful! Only issue I’ve run into is the cushion cover on one side has begun to work it’s way loose. Not a deal breaker by any means but the construction does worry me a little. For the price I can’t complain and the sound has me smiling every time I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: These things fit well, look nice, and have sound quality equal to the money spent. However, the foam comes apart after use. My wife was lucky to get 3 months of use before they fell apart. Poor purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these based on a previous reviewer's using them for law prep for my husband. He needed something that was comfortable to listen to hours of online lectures. I purchased these and a second pair of something totally different. These were so comfortable from the get-go that he didn't even bother trying the other pair! LOL Highly recommend & I will definitely be putting these on my Christmas list for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I'm quite happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a discontinued item at much cheaper than original manufacturer price. I had read on other reviews about the heavy bass. Yes, the sound isn't as flat as I would prefer but a bit of adjustment to my mp3 player's levels helped. The big surprise was the cord. They are actually 2.5mm, so the cord is not replaceable. Otherwise I'm quite happy with my purchase. They are very comfortable for long wear while I'm working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go-to, extended trip, headphones
customer_reviews.text: For me personally, these are a much more comfortable fit than the "over-ear" option by Skullcandy (aka: the "Aviator" headphones). Very comfortable for long periods of time. Perfect for those long airplane trips. Not noise cancelling by any means but minimal sound leak and good volume range with full enough sound quality for the price point, make these my new go-to, extended trip, headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McElfresh

customer_reviews.title: They look really nice, and have a good amount of adjustability
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice, and have a good amount of adjustability, but you have to fiddle with them quite a bit to get the sound to come out of both ears.. and then the sound isn't bad. But its still not fantastic. Which is sad, since all my other skullcandy headphones (always had earbuds before) have had good sound and been well made products. Maybe would have been better if they hadn't made the cord removable. Still, a pretty good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Triquetra113

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Good Feel
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. I own both these and the Skullcandy Aviators in white. The sound representation is a little bass'y but I have always liked that sound profile over anything tin'y sounding. Very clear sound and comfortable to wear for slightly longer periods of time. I use them mostly at work or when I'm working on the go and they work great for conference calls when I'm not jamming out while getting things done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The headphones only played sound out of one side and only for about 20 minutes before dying completely. I’m so disappointed since my last skullcandy set was so great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gregersen

customer_reviews.title: I love this headset
customer_reviews.text: Skull Candy is my go-to headset company. They make a good headset, and stand behind their products. I love these because they're noise cancelling, very comfortable, and they fold up to prevent them getting broken in my backpack or purse.
customer_reviews.author: sue cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them when they were on sale at 20 a piece. Well built and good sound quality. Too bad they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! one of the best headphones I have ever owned! recommend all the way. Great style too, very comfy and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: They sound good and they look good but they aren't meant for ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound good and they look good but they aren't meant for durability. I've had mine for just over a year and the pleather on the ear pads are tearing and coming off. From what I understand Skullcandy has a pretty good return policy though, so hopefully I can just get them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tito Lebowitz

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, yes. Sound quality, meh
customer_reviews.text: They're okay headphones, but when I wear them for more then an hour my ears really start to hurt and I can't wear them anymore. But, that's probably because I have a big head and the band is made of metal. But if you wear them for 20 minutes or so, they're really comfy. As far as sound quality goes, they sound like any typical $50 headphone. But the main thing that was disappointing for me was the bass. I was expecting more bass from a Skullcandy product.
customer_reviews.author: George Dumars

customer_reviews.title: No repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and stopped staying fully plugged in my phone. Only audio device having this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kay

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Decent bass
customer_reviews.text: Not as high end as some, but looks nice, solid build quality for on-ear headphones and has decent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Yu

customer_reviews.title: navagators are great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the navigators.sometime ago.for 100$.THEY had just came out.that year.I liked them then because of the way they felt.on my ears. I returned them for a pair of aviators.bad mistake!!I sold the aviators.I bought the navigators again.THEY don't put weight on my ears.unlike the aviators. I'm staying with the navigators .
customer_reviews.author: Anthony crawford

customer_reviews.title: Your headphone will stop working
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not leave reviews but I wanted to warn any other potential buyer. The headphone will fail within 2-3 months and you will be left with junk. I was like you and thought the reviews mentioning this failure was just an exception but no. This will likely happen to you as well. There are tons of better options out there I highly recommend you move on without looking back
customer_reviews.author: Ammar K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Cord lasted less than 6 months before too much static to use. Kept in safe spots, did not wrap cord or bend, and yet it still had stopped working far sooner than it should have. So disappointed because these are the most comfortable headphones I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: ZaDeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Only one ear half worked when I first tried them ...
customer_reviews.text: Only one ear half worked when I first tried them and they were scratched as well. Luckily I got them for a cosplay prop and prefer earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, and does it well.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good, great mic. This is my second one (first one wore out after 3 years), and I couldn't be happier with this product. I've been thru about 8 bluetooth headsets and 4 wired headsets, and this is the one I've settled on. Skullcandy offered to replace my last headset under warranty, but I decided to buy a new one because a company that makes this great of a product deserves my patronage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Manzo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running long distances!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly how it was described. It arrived exactly when it said it was going to arrive. I love the headphones. They are great when I run. I always had issues with earbuds because they would fall out of my ears as I ran long distances. The sound quality is awesome! These headphones are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Blair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The Skullcandy Navigators feel solidly built, are comfortable enough for all day wear, and have great sound quality for the price. While they may not offer the dynamic range demanded by a true audiophile, they have earned a place in my workbag and flight carry-on. They block external noise fairly well and are quite adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, no major issues. I just wish it was a bit louder and Bluetooth capable. Besides that its great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Renriqué M Primus

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quality build for the price. My kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and quality build for the price. My kids shred regular plastic headsets so the metal band is a big plus. These do run on the small side so if your noggin is a planetoid probably not for you, or me....sigh. Anyway definitely an on the ear rather than over the ear style.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Blastwave

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for the price. The cushions are very comfortable and the headphones fold up to easily be stored away. The sound quality is excellent, but for some unexplainable reason I tend to use my AKG headphones more often.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are designed to fall apart after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headphones with great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones with great sound quality. Since the cord is removable from the headphones, it would be pretty easy to combine this with a Bluetooth receiver and convert these headphones to Bluetooth wireless if you wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: AmznRvwr

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Okay sound. Most Skullcandy headphones I've tried have lots of bass but this pair have quite a bit less than I expected with this brand. That could be a pro or a con depending on your preference. Overall they are more or less worth the discounted price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great headphones for $40.00
customer_reviews.text: Pros The headphones sound great. Slightly bass heavy but nothing to complain about. Cons Not great for long use. Since they are on ear when u wear them for a long time they start to hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: the quality is very good and the sound is pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: i just receive it, the quality is very good and the sound is pretty decent, is lack of some base, but that can be fixed with the equalisation of the music. i find them confortable, but i notice that they produce some kind of vacuum in the ear, it is not uncomfortable, but is a little weird. over all i definitely like it and recommend this product. also it arrived almost a week earlier than expected to Mexico
customer_reviews.author: Rene Molnar

customer_reviews.title: since I'm pretty rough on my equipment
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these headphones multiple times - and that's saying something, since I'm pretty rough on my equipment; they have lasted significantly longer than any other brand I've tried. I can wear them for hours without discomfort, and have never gotten that annoying "pressure headache" that some headsets can cause. They're a neat statement piece (and keep your ears decently protected on a windy day!).
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality headphones. Seller had it at my door within 2 days and price was great!
customer_reviews.author: EaZy E and A Sales

customer_reviews.title: these have good sound but are much lower quality than the same ...
customer_reviews.text: these have good sound but are much lower quality than the same navigators I bought for 80 a few years ago but authentic
customer_reviews.author: Uturn

customer_reviews.title: Really good and stylish headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones! Definitely worth the price. Just if the volume of the noise is too loud, you can hear a really faint buzzing noise but other than that, I’ve had no problems! Really would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... teenage daughter and they are very cute and very good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Buy these headphones for my teenage daughter and they are very cute and very good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Ricardo Sanchez V.

customer_reviews.title: Average. Lower quality than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good... For $20+.. they broke 2 weeks later.. the leather material pulled away from the ear peice. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Crizzz99

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last 2 months and are already not working 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were cool. But then one side stopped working after maybe a month or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: Benoit Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Decent not the best
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones sound quality is OK for average listener. I had a pair of Jbl's that was much better. The material is not too good. The head phones kind of started to rip apart and I don't handle them any crazy way.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Really feeling these headphones.. From the build quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Really feeling these headphones.. From the build quality to the crisp sound.I really can hear every element in the music I listen to.Looking forward to getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Almeco Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality of the headies. They’re very comfortable and fit nicely on the the ears. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bass enhancement, great sound overall, and isolates pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Wineguy

customer_reviews.title: Worth $5
customer_reviews.text: Came with blown right ear. Not worth the headache to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Derone Penn

customer_reviews.title: The headphones or the seller sucks
customer_reviews.text: I had one pair for a month before it shorted out, and another pair for two weeks before it did the same. The first pair the cloth started to fall off before the second week.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: good skullcandy headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was finally able to find a Skullcandy product that is actually decent. The sound is not as good as Sennheiser Momentum but for the price not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kyo0013

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Useless Mic.
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Very comfortable. But the mic doesn’t work very well with my phone and not at all with the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: pi

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound and build quality!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and build quality are good. The memory foam padding is comfortable on my ears. My only complaint is the 3 button mic/control. The pause button is the only button that works if you have an android phone. Overall this is solid headphone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M.Samson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice headphones for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking that these and the aviators. I thought that this would be a better choice and was not disappointed. The sound is clear with good bass to it and when listening at work I cant here to much around me. Only down side when i received them there was a scratch on the side but you really cant see it. all and all I'm very happy with this choice and I am think about getting another pair for at home.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love Skull candy
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son bought a pair and uses them all the time. When my Mother in Law needed a nice pair we got her these and she loves them. Great sound, great fit and great price.
customer_reviews.author: WNYPortGirl

customer_reviews.title: This are so comfortable you forget you even have them one
customer_reviews.text: This are so comfortable you forget you even have them one! They even come with a nice carry case that you can store them in.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these Earphones, I want to grab some aviators.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Make, Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Decent sounds, not terrible headphones overall but the stock cord it comes with is absolutely terrible. You've got to shift it around in the jack repeatedly over the course of listening to clear the distortion in the line. Would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great until one side stopped working just 6 months later
customer_reviews.author: Vydhehi

customer_reviews.title: Great amazing. Love love love Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great amazing. Love love love Amazon!!!!!!!!! My headphones sounds fabouless. Always happy with Amazon. Thank you so very much. Love u guys. Jim bruno
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad of a quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent for its price $28ish. Not too bad of a quality, decent isolation. Can work for PCs and androids. Cord isn't replaceable if it breaks so that's a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son's birthday. It was defective out of the box. The plug in connection on the headphone was bad and the earphones would only work if the plug was twisted side to side until it made contact. As soon as you took the pressure off the plug it stopped working again. I have ordered a replacement, but haven't yet received it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Like the design
customer_reviews.text: Like the design, but sound quality not as expected. Aviator is way better. I wouldn't mind if it's as expensive as Aviator but please get me some quality of sound... Don't waste that cool design!
customer_reviews.author: Yangfan Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Great Skullcandy Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband as a Christmas gift and he loves them! Says for what I paid for them the sound and quality very good!
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear full sound and good base
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear full sound and good base. Head band is a little stiff which makes them a little too tight on the ears. Overall like them and use them for at home listening. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: david hand

customer_reviews.title: Jazzy
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves them. Wish they came with an extra set of cord. Cat chewed thru it. They were able to find some online.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Need to return these - I have a pretty small head and these are vise-grip tight - they ...
customer_reviews.text: Need to return these - I have a pretty small head and these are vise-grip tight - they kill your ears after about 10 minutes of wear. SO sad because the style's cool.
customer_reviews.author: domestica

customer_reviews.title: pretty good headphone
customer_reviews.text: i bought these a bit ago the sound quality is good but they are pretty small and hurt my ear after a bit
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Normal headphones for their price
customer_reviews.text: Very light, do not feel them on my head at all. Quality is of sound is okay, materials are equal to what you pay. Look stylish, like all Skullcandy products
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Vasilkov

customer_reviews.title: Love these- great quality for listening to music off my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these- great quality for listening to music off my laptop in the office. Love the tortoise pattern as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelyplayfellow

customer_reviews.title: sound and look great. Not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but can be uncomfortable for long periods of time. These hurt my ears if I use them for more than an hour
customer_reviews.author: Technerd87

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, GARBAGE. Falls apart within days
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, material falls off within 4-5 days of use, total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Triple7

customer_reviews.title: BASS HEAVY, GOOD FOR TEENS
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these. Bass heavy, not for discerning adult listeners, but decent quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and compact but the sound is muddy and awful. I've only used Apple EarPods and those are a million times better
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office
customer_reviews.text: A good solid headphone, not the crystal clear sound and drive expected based on the reviews but they are pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: GB in merica

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones since they actually fit my head
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones since they actually fit my head. And the sound is great. But I am bummed that they are not Android compatible for the volume and Mic. I must of missed it somewhere in the product info or I would of went with something else.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these headphones and says they cut out all the noise around him without covering his entire ear. They are also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Sound Great, They Look Great
customer_reviews.text: My teen son loved these! They sound great and they look retro, which he absolutely loves. When you fold them in they look like aviator glasses. Got them at 80% off too, what a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Mina Beana

customer_reviews.title: Great headset. Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Super comfortable. Give thema try. For the price, you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Educational Roots

customer_reviews.title: my son said they have good
customer_reviews.text: Had these less than a month and they are already tearing around ear piece, my son said they have good sound
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: A nice and durable headset which provides a ton of sound. Background noise is minimal but not completely which is good if someone tries to get my attention. The price was great compared to other over the ear headphones on the market and the microphone works well for phone calls. Overall great product. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Preston

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable than Beats Solo (AND cheeper)
customer_reviews.text: My son has the Beats Solo... He got really jealous when his sister got these for her birthday. Much more comfortable, and at a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: SuperFixerUpperMom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He had the choice to switch these for his sisters Beats and kept these.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Oppelt

customer_reviews.title: Its sounds great and comfortable and i like the brand skullcandy its ...
customer_reviews.text: Its sounds great and comfortable and i like the brand skullcandy its worth the Money u pay for the headphones
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Use them at the computer so I don't keep everyone else awake.
customer_reviews.author: SEMCOMSO

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: my box was opened and a use pair of headphones was what I received
customer_reviews.author: Raul Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and son love both of theirs. Good quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Launi Mccombs

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Bought one for husband for Christmas and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought one for husband for Christmas and had to get one for myself too. Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Ear Piece ripped :(
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and work great but ripped in 10 months of light usage
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sandy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for my daughter to use on a 16 hour band (bus) trip. She loved the look and feel. The sound quality was very good. I personally prefer my Skull Candy earbuds (own 5 pairs to keep at different locations), but she doesn't like the feel of earbuds and wanted over-ear headphones. I didn't really want to pay as much as I did, but hey, it was her senior trip... you only live once. Hey, it "beats" paying $200 for a pair of headphones...
customer_reviews.author: conservative dad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awsome like new 1/4 price fast shipping sound awesome thx
customer_reviews.author: sandalwood royalty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It a great head phone. Sound quality is real good.
customer_reviews.author: Fmm

customer_reviews.title: Sound good
customer_reviews.text: They fit good and sound good, but the smaller size (on ear design) hurts your ears after a while. Should have purchased the Aviator to get the full size version.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Not as loud like i would want them to be but happy with my purchase.. if you wear them in a long time it will start feeling hot around your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Mig

customer_reviews.title: the cord is super spotty and the sound cuts out
customer_reviews.text: the cord is super spotty and the sound cuts out. I was excited for these, but ended up very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my tennage son, he's had them for a few weeks now and I haven't heard any complaints yet. So far so good. I like that they look very sleek and they sound excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Don't make my mistake and go in thinking that these are just the over-ear version of the Aviators! These are smaller as well, which I personally didn't like. I gave them to my brother, because the sound is still awesome, as I expect from skullcandy, and I just gave in and bought a pair of aviators. But for the price the sound quality and construction of these headphones (Which seems very durable) is 100% worth it
customer_reviews.author: See-air-uh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, weight, appearance. Great quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: M.N. Moseley

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Navigator On-ear Headphone with Mic3, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackNavigate your music library in total comfort with crystal clear sound while wearing the Skullcandy Navigator Mic 3 Headphones. The smaller cousin of the Aviator, the Navigator delivers the same rich sound and deep bass as its larger relative thanks to the 40mm drivers, and you can still answer phone calls with the touch of a button with the Mic 3 in-line microphone.
feature_bullets: Control your iOS device with the 3 button mic. Connectivity technology: Wired
Creates extremely smooth sound with powerful bass
Ergonomic design specifically to fit the shape of your head and ears
Detachable Cable and includes travel bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars488 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
